ticket.title: date_select include_blank
ticket.original-body: I noticed that date_select does not allow to use prompt option as other selects do. You can only pass :include_blank, which causes an empty option to be inserted at top. Empty options cause alerts when working with w3c validations (I use HTML Transitional). It would be nice If one could pass :prompt option too.
